mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.LAST_NAME as lastName, a.FIRST_NAME as firstName, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate, a.CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID as coCrsEntityId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , LAST_NAME , FIRST_NAME , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE , CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{lastName} , #{firstName} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} , #{coCrsEntityId} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
LAST_NAME ,
FIRST_NAME ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE ,
CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{lastName} ,
#{firstName} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,
#{updatedDate} ,
#{coCrsEntityId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
LAST_NAME = #{lastName} ,
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} ,
CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID = #{coCrsEntityId}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , LAST_NAME , FIRST_NAME , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE , CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.lastName} , #{item.firstName} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} , #{item.coCrsEntityId} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , LAST_NAME = #{item.lastName} , FIRST_NAME = #{item.firstName} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} , CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID = #{item.coCrsEntityId} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , LAST_NAME = #{lastName} , FIRST_NAME = #{firstName} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} , CO_CRS_ENTITY_ID = #{coCrsEntityId} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_CRS_ENTITY_CONTR a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
